txt.en: Tithenolf has fallen!
Instance: Forest for the Trees
Fight your way through Drû Vádokan
Approach Voskor
TBD
'The Orcs will trouble us no longer, my bold friend. Hoom. Let us return to Stonecliff and enjoy this peace.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Barallas and the Ents must survive</rgb>

'Hooom. We have travelled far, little one... and the time has come for us to reclaim our forest.

'The others have journeyed here, and should be arriving soon...

'Of course, if Tithenolf has fallen asleep again.... Hum, I could not speak to where he might be.'

Barallas appears to become lost in thought for a moment before remembering he is speaking to you.

'Hoom, I think I hear their approach.... Let us hope it is them, [placeholder].'
As Tithenolf slowly strides forth, it is clear the last Ent has arrived
'Hoom, I see the first of their kind just outside their camp up the road.\n\n'Let us bring our branches crashing down upon them....'
Barallas and the Ents have decided to assault Drû Vádokan and put an end to the White Hand presence in Fangorn Forest.
Barallas and the other Ents are outside Drû Vádokan.\n\nThe Ents are ready to assault Drû Vádokan. You should speak to Barallas and begin the assault.

Barallas is standing outside Drû Vádokan.\n\nBarallas and the others have travelled to Drû Vádokan and now stand ready to raze what remains of the Orc forces in Balewood. You should speak to him while you wait for the others to arrive.
Voskor can be found inside Drû Vádokan.\n\nBarallas and the Ents have discovered a vile Uruk leading the Orc forces in Balewood, but he appears to be wounded.
Talk to Barallas
Barallas and the Ents are marching to assault Drû Vádokan.\n\nYou should follow Barallas and the other Ents as they march to the gate of Drû Vádokan.
Wait for the Ents to arrive outside Drû Vádokan
Barallas is outside Drû Vádokan.\n\nYou should wait for the other Ents to arrive before beginning the assault.
Mossbeard has fallen!
Follow Barallas and the Ents to the gate
Strongroot has fallen!
Nindorn has fallen!
Talk to Barallas
Defeat Voskor
Voskor is standing in the middle of Drû Vádokan.\n\nYou should approach Voskor and confront him with the Ents of Balewood.
Barallas and the Ents are attacking Drû Vádokan.\n\nYou should follow them into battle to ensure their success.
With Voskor's death, a sense of peace has returned to Balewood
The glow of flames can be seen as an Uruk rushes forth in the distance
Barallas has fallen!
